intro: Anadenia flexuosa, commonly known as the zigzag lily, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Amaryllidaceae family and is characterized by its unique, zigzagging stems. The plant produces showy, bell-shaped flowers that are typically white or pale pink. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Anadenia flexuosa is often cultivated for its ornamental value and ease of care.
